body.raw:
{
	"url-regex": "order/3/orders/1/\\d+/unlock",
	"method": "POST",	
	"action-type": "SendResponse",
	"response": {
	    "dateCreated": "2018-06-29T07:56:10.715Z",
	    "dateUpdated": "2018-06-29T08:04:24.130Z",
	    "id": "13273652391352000667",
	    "expireAt": "2018-09-27T07:56:10.716Z",
	    "sourceOrganization": "radiant-pos-uat",
	    "dateAcknowledged": "2018-06-29T07:58:22.717Z",
	    "enterpriseUnitId": "48ba68ef96b64166b0d7955f4aeb7987",
	    "comments": "People on the Go, Go to Wawa!",
	    "channel": "PhoneIn",
	    "customer": {
	        "firstName": "John",
	        "lastName": "Doe",
	        "phone": "555-1212"
	    },
	    "referenceId": "12346578912345678900123456789465115165",
	    "source": "GrubHub",
	    "status": "OrderPlaced",
	    "totals": [
	        {
	            "type": "Net",
	            "value": 4.5,
	            "lineId": "lineId"
	        }
	    ],
	    "fulfillment": {
	        "address": {
	            "line1": "864 Spring St NW",
	            "city": "Atlanta",
	            "state": "GA",
	            "postalCode": "30308"
	        },
	        "pickupDate": "2018-05-29T00:00:00Z",
	        "type": "Delivery",
	        "autoRelease": true
	    },
	    "fees": [],
	    "orderLines": [
	        {
	            "extendedAmount": 4.5,
	            "notes": [],
	            "productId": {
	                "type": "RPOS-ID",
	                "value": "5070000318-70000000020-0-0"
	            },
	            "quantity": {
	                "value": 1
	            },
	            "substitutionAllowed": false,
	            "unitPrice": 4.5,
	            "overridePrice": true,
	            "lineId": "1"
	        }
	    ],
	    "payments": [
	        {
	            "amount": 4.5,
	            "description": "description",
	            "status": "Paid",
	            "type": "Cash",
	            "payBalance": true,
	            "lineId": "beceeb592e5b46f9a0d915fdfc021040"
	        }
	    ],
	    "taxes": [],
	    "additionalReferenceIds": {},
	    "taxExempt": false,
	    "taxExemptId": "sampleString",
	    "totalModifiers": [],
	    "partySize": 0,
	    "pickupContact": {
	        "name": "Jane Doe",
	        "company": "GrubHub",
	        "imageLink": "sampleString",
	        "phone": "555-1212",
	        "hasArrived": false
	    },
	    "etag": "2018-06-29T08:04:24.130Z"
	}
}

This rest endpoint updates the availability information for all items in the request for a specific enterprise unit. Requires the IAS_MULTI_ITEM_ADMINISTRATOR role.
This rest endpoint updates the availability information for all items in the request for a specific enterprise unit. Requires the IAS_MULTI_ITEM_ADMINISTRATOR role.
This rest endpoint will clear all unavailable items for the specified enterprise unit. Requires the IAS_CLEAR_ALL role.
This rest endpoint retrieves the availability information for the specified item & enterprise unit. Requires the IAS_SINGLE_ITEM_VIEWER role.
This rest endpoint retrieves the availability information for the specified item & enterprise unit. Requires the IAS_SINGLE_ITEM_VIEWER role.
